entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
